N = int(raw_input())

for i in xrange(N):
    length = int(raw_input())
    pies = map(int, raw_input().split())
    racks = map(int, raw_input().split())
    
    pies.sort(reverse = True)
    racks.sort(reverse = True)
    
    pointer = 0
    count = 0
    
    for j in xrange(length):
        if(pies[j] <= racks[pointer]):
            count += 1
            pointer += 1
    
    print count
